Test Case Description: Verify Display of All Products List
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the shop page
Expected Results: All products should be displayed in the list
Actual Results: All products are displayed in the list

Test Case Description: Verify Fallback UI on Server Error
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the shop page 3. Trigger a server error (e.g., by manipulating network requests)
Expected Results: An error message should be displayed

Test Case Description: Verify Navigation to Product Details Page from Product List
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the product list page 3. Click on a product from the list
Expected Results: Product detail page for the selected product should be displayed
Actual Results: Product detail page for the selected product is displayed

Test Case Description: Verify Error Message for Unavailable Product
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the product list page 3. Search for a product that doesn't exist
Expected Results: An error message should be displayed (e.g., "No product found")
